name: nrel_api_id
description: ID of the station from the NREL API

name: cell_radius_mi
description: Radius of the search cell in miles

name: ev_connector_types
description: Semicolon-delimited list of plug types at station

name: ev_network
description: Name of the EV charging network that owns the station, if any

name: pricing
description: Information about how much users must pay to charge

name: geocode_accuracy
description: Indicates how precise the latitude and longitude are. 'GPS' is best preicision, lower numbers are worse with 200-1 being country-level and 200-0 being Unknown

name: network_ids
description: CNO-specific network IDs for stations or even down to the plug in some cases
